1) Amplified Intelligence


Transform Your Business
with Peter Sandström

In a digitally-driven world, businesses require more than just a consultant; they need a visionary architect who understands the digital landscape and can anticipate and actively mould the future. Enter Peter Sandström, your Stockholm-based ally, bringing over two decades of transformative leadership and strategic prowess into play. With Peter, you're not just adapting to the digital era; you're leveraging it to your advantage, turning technological advancements into profitable opportunities, and achieving not just results but remarkable success stories. Experience transformative journeys where your digital goals aren't just met; they're exceeded, propelling your business into innovation, growth, and unparalleled leadership in your industry.

Empowering Digital Evolution
with Strategic Oversight and Innovation

Peter stands at the confluence of strategic mastery and technological innovation, providing a robust suite of services designed to empower businesses through their digital evolution journey. His offerings include solutions, pivotal digital transformation game-changers, interim leadership, and innovation of Amplified Intelligence.

Strategic Digital Transformation

With Peter's vast experience, confidently navigate the digital landscape. He architects pioneering strategies, crafts outlines of bespoke blueprints to position your business at the digital evolution's forefront, turns challenges into opportunities, and drives sustainable growth.

Agile Interim Leadership

In transition or critical scaling periods, Peter steps in with adaptive leadership roles, such as CTO/CIO/CDO or Managing Director. His guidance is more than temporary stewardship; it's a transformative force, vital for maintaining momentum, fostering innovation, and steering your company through the multifaceted phases of digital integration and expansion.

AI Innovation in Practice

Peter's expertise transcends conventional boundaries by integrating AI into business paradigms. Leveraging deep ties with industry-leading tech spheres, he ensures your business harnesses the full potential of amplifíed intelligence, streamlining processes and igniting innovation. While AI transformation is at the forefront, he strategically helps scale back on cloud services, making digital operations more efficient and cost-effective.

About Peter Sandström:
The Digital Transformer

Peter has a storied career marked by substantial achievements, from spearheading digital initiatives at ICA, IKEA, Alstom, and ASSA ABLOY to transformative roles at Devoteam, Deloitte, and SATS. His unique strength lies in harmonising technology with business, cultivating strategic partnerships, and realising untapped market potential.

Proven Track Record of
Leadership and Innovation

Peter's work history is a testament to his skill in leading high-impact initiatives and driving technological integration across various sectors. His strategic leadership at Devoteam resulted in team expansion and higher customer satisfaction. His insights into AI and cloud technologies have consistently translated into innovative, practical business solutions.
